evidence.claim: FullCircle employs AWS for their cloud infrastructure, indicating a reliance on scalable serverless architectures.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring that their health data handling meets legal standards.
Integration with X12 transaction sets is supported as part of their health-tech services, facilitating efficient data exchanges.
Their documentation references using FHIR standards for health data interoperability, aligning with modern healthcare data exchange practices.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards and APIs for healthcare data exchange, fitting target ICP profile.
